seniority_level.evidence: Comprehensive skill set including Spark, PySpark, ETL, and cloud platforms suggests more than entry level, but lack of 'Senior' in title and no explicit years of experience prevents higher confidence

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' and description focuses on ETL pipelines, data modeling, data warehousing, and distributed data processing

sub_specialty.evidence: Emphasis on ETL pipelines, data warehousing concepts, and batch processing with Spark, though Kafka streaming capabilities mentioned as nice-to-have

leadership_expectation.evidence: Mentions 'provide regular support/guidance to project teams' and 'Lead the design and construction' suggesting technical leadership without direct reports

primary_cloud.evidence: Lists AWS, Azure, and GCP as cloud platform options without specifying a primary preference

secondary_clouds.evidence: Since primary is multi-cloud with no clear secondary, empty array is appropriate

processing_paradigm.evidence: Primary focus on ETL pipelines and batch processing with Spark, though Kafka streaming mentioned as nice-to-have

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned in job description

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions 'data warehousing concepts' as core requirement, though big data technologies could suggest lake patterns

remote_restriction.evidence: Specifically requires onsite work in Bengaluru East, Karnataka, India with no remote options mentioned

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite requirement in specific Bengaluru location implies relocation needed for candidates not already in that area

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned in job posting
